name: The Covfefe
description:
What does Covfefe mean? You couldn't found Covfefe any where in any dictionary! Covfefe means nothing...or...doesn't it? The answer is it depends. It depends on who says it, you, me or the president of the United States.

HOW TO PLAY:
- You are the dot at the center
- As other dots come to you, locate one with the same color with you and swipe your finger to that dot and you will be fine
- Some dots would have an icon on it, those dots will have extra effect when you hit them.

Thanks for stopping by. Hope you will enjoy the game!
